    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Hole​(int row, int col, Algorithims game)
      Constructor for the Hole class - sets the row, column, and game Sets the preferred size of the hole to 30x30 pixels and the background to transparent with a light background if active It only enables dropping if the row is active (1)
